languages.text: "У вас, пустотных штурмовиков, возможно. Но в планетарной пехоте потери столь высоки, что я предпочитаю не запоминать даже имен бойцов ниже сержантского звания".
"Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."
languages.original_text: "У вас, пустотных штурмовиков, возможно. Но в планетарной пехоте потери столь высоки, что я предпочитаю не запоминать даже имен бойцов ниже сержантского звания".

traits.locale_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I prefer not to remember the names of soldiers who are below sergeant."
"Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I prefer not to remember the names of soldiers who are below sergeant."
"Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."
"Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."
"Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

languages.text: “或许对你们虚空士兵来说确实如此，但我们行星防御部队的士兵损失非常惨重，我宁愿不去记所有军士以下级别士兵的名字。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: “或许对你们虚空士兵来说确实如此，但我们行星防御部队的士兵损失非常惨重，我宁愿不去记所有军士以下级别士兵的名字。”

languages.text: «A lo mejor para un soldado del vacío las cosas son así. Pero en la infantería planetaria tenemos tantas bajas que es mejor no recordar el nombre de nadie de rango inferior a sargento».
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor para un soldado del vacío las cosas son así. Pero en la infantería planetaria tenemos tantas bajas que es mejor no recordar el nombre de nadie de rango inferior a sargento».

languages.text: 「ヴォイドトルーパーならそうなのかもしれない。だが、惑星の歩兵部隊は損失が大きすぎて、軍曹以下の兵士の名前を覚えたくはない」
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイドトルーパーならそうなのかもしれない。だが、惑星の歩兵部隊は損失が大きすぎて、軍曹以下の兵士の名前を覚えたくはない」

languages.text: "Das mag für Euch Raumsoldaten gelten. Aber bei der planetaren Infanterie sind die Verluste so hoch, dass ich mich an die Namen von Soldaten unter dem Sergeant-Rang lieber gar nicht erinnere."
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: "Das mag für Euch Raumsoldaten gelten. Aber bei der planetaren Infanterie sind die Verluste so hoch, dass ich mich an die Namen von Soldaten unter dem Sergeant-Rang lieber gar nicht erinnere."

languages.text: « C'est peut-être votre lot, à vous autres, les soldats spatiaux. Mais au sein de l'infanterie planétaire, les pertes sont si élevées que je préfère ne pas retenir les noms des types qui se trouvent en dessous du grade de sergent. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: « C'est peut-être votre lot, à vous autres, les soldats spatiaux. Mais au sein de l'infanterie planétaire, les pertes sont si élevées que je préfère ne pas retenir les noms des types qui se trouvent en dessous du grade de sergent. »

languages.text: "Belki siz uçsuz erleri için durum böyledir ama gezegendeki piyadeler o kadar büyük kayıplar verir ki, çavuş rütbesinin altındaki askerlerin bir tanesinin bile adını bilmemeyi tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "Maybe that's how it is for you void troopers. But down in the planetary infantry, the losses are so high that I'd rather not remember the names of any soldiers ranked below sergeant."

traits.locale_text: "Belki siz uçsuz erleri için durum böyledir ama gezegendeki piyadeler o kadar büyük kayıplar verir ki, çavuş rütbesinin altındaki askerlerin bir tanesinin bile adını bilmemeyi tercih ederim."
